document.full_text: visitors to a muddy hillside overlooking where hijacked united airlines flight 93 crashed nearly ten years ago, solemnly hailed on monday the military's "relentless pursuit of justice" in killing al qaeda leader osama bin laden.
document.title: pennsylvania crash site visitors hail bin laden death
lines_and_colors: visitors to a muddy hillside overlooking where hijacked united airlines flight 93 crashed nearly ten years ago, solemnly hailed on monday the military's "relentless pursuit of justice" in killing al qaeda leader osama bin laden.
